verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All the angels round His throne praise Him!
All you people on earth below praise Him!
Mountains high and oceans wide praise Him!
Give Him praise, give Him praise
Give Him praise from your hearts

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All the angels round Your throne praise Him!
.................................
We give You praise, we give You praise
Give You praise from our hearts
- for He is God
